learningpod.title: Kaplan Kids (Reading): [IMAGE] In this sentence, what could you substitute for the nonsense word stoxily? [I...

p.b: The tiger waited stoxily as the deer ate the tall grass.

questionBody.p: In this sentence, what could you substitute for the nonsense word stoxily?

simpleChoice.p: another noun that tells where the tiger waited
another adverb that describes how the tiger did something
another verb that shows what the tiger did
another adjective that describes how the tiger looked
